quotes.quote: Every decision you make reflects your evaluation of who you are.
The painter goes through states of fullness and evaluation. That is the whole secret of art.
If you have a high evaluation of yourself then your ability to recognize new facts is weakened.
Evaluations, in essence, are… ways of being, modes of existence of those who judge and evaluate.
True genius resides in the capacity for evaluation of uncertain, hazardous, and conflicting information.
It's objective evaluations that give our hardwiring principles teeth and drive the organization toward results that last.
Self-evaluation directs us to prepare our next performance from the past and today's experiences.
A sort of egotistical self-evaluation is unavoidable in those joys in which erudition and art mingle and in which aesthetic pleasure may become more acute, but not remain as pure.
The expectation of a reward or evaluation, even a positive evaluation, squelched creativity.
Self-Evaluation is healthy and constructive. Denial and self-delusion is DESTRUCTIVE.
When the locus of evaluation is seen as residing in the expert, it would appear that the long-range social implications are in the direction of the social control of the many by the few.
Stringent standards of self-evaluation [can] make otherwise objective successes seem to be personal failures.
Evaluation by others is not a guide for me.
Without proper self-evaluation, failure is inevitable.
Objective evaluations set the foundation that moves leaders to the tipping point.
Some people's unwillingness to think for themselves represents accurate self-evaluation
Ideally, each piece of art's its own unique object, and its evaluation's always present-tense.
A women who does not know herself has no choice other than to live with other people's evaluations.
Evaluation schemes that implicate 100% of the staff to detect a small % of incompetents are a waste of time.
Even worthwhile endeavors need evaluation in order to determine if they have become distractions from the best goals.
Planning, evaluation, reasoning and establishing prioritites are all more important than brilliance - either behind the wheel or at the drawing board.
Unless strategy evaluation is performed seriously and systematically, and unless strategists are willing to act on the results, energy will be used up defending yesterday.
The natural response to evaluation is to feel judged. We have to mature to a place where we respond to it with gratitude, and love feedback.
A truthful evaluation of yourself gives feedback for growth and success.
The evaluation of an action as 'practical,' depends on what it is that one wishes to practice.
Proper evaluations of words and letters in their phonetic and associated sense can bring the people of earth to the clear light of pure cosmic wisdom.
... A sober evaluation of the data suggests the phenomena warrants further scrutiny.
The best evaluation I can make of a player is to look in his eyes and see how scared they are.
The final evaluation of a play has nothing to do with immediate audience or critical response.
We make investment decisions based on our evaluation of the most profitable combination of probabilities.
The most glaring deficiency in traditional economic models is that they completely ignore the role of context in evaluation.
Teachers support evaluations based on multiple measures: student growth, classroom observation and feedback from peers and parents.
Careful evaluation of information that is portrayed as fact is critical.
